thread.title: Amazon Prime Members: Beauty Box w/ Full Size Razor Only $11.99 Shipped + Get $11.99 Credit
thread.title_full: Amazon Prime Members: Beauty Box w/ Full Size Razor Only $11.99 Shipped + Get $11.99 Credit

author: mpricehip2save
title: Amazon Prime Members: Beauty Box w/ Full Size Razor Only $11.99 Shipped + Get $11.99 Credit

organizations.name: body shop new nutriganics drops of youth aveeno skin relief lotion & body wash

text:
For a limited time, Amazon Prime Members only can head to Amazon.com and grab an Amazon Beauty box for $11.99 shipped. Even sweeter, when you buy one of these beauty boxes, you will receive an $11.99 credit towards your next purchase of qualifying full size beauty items!
About a week after your purchase, you’ll receive an email with details on how to redeem your credit!
This beauty box contains a full-size Gillette Women’s Venus Swirl Razor and 11 sample size versions of the following products:
L’Oreal Paris Age Perfect Hydra-Nutrition: Eyes & Face Aquaphor Advanced Therapy Healing Ointment Skin Protectant Nivea Nourishing Body Oil The Body Shop New Nutriganics Drops of Youth Aveeno Skin Relief Lotion & Body Wash, Nourishing Coconut Dove Body Wash, Deep Moisture Crest 3D White Sample Kit Acure Brightening Facial Scrub L’Oreal Paris Revitalift Bright Reveal SPF 30 Moisturizer Pantene Daily Moisture Renewal Shampoo Tom’s of Maine Natural Powder Deodorant, Naturally Dry Not an Amazon Prime member? Sign up for a FREE 30-day trial here ! (Thanks, Money Saving Mom !)
